title: Gettysburg National Military Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved                   Artist in Residence               NPS Centennial               Partners               Donate               Volunteer               Work With Us               Planning               Support Your Park         Â    Artist in Residence Artists in Residence Program: inspire, engage, and connect with a new generation of artists and visitors.  NPS Centennial The National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016. Find out more. Partners Learn more about the partners who help us operate.  Donate Find out how you can help preserve the battlefield. Volunteer Are you interested in becoming a volunteer at Gettysburg?  Work With Us Learn more about how to work with the National Park Service. Planning Park documents about the sustainability and preservation of park resources. Support Your Park Find out more about how you can help support the park.
